mapper.insert: insert into distinguish_type (user_id, dep_id, danger_point, flag, del, ctime, utime) values (#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dep_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{danger_point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:

user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dep_id = #{dep_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
danger_point = #{danger_point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
